Hi! and thank you for downloading the App. 
What you have in hands is something that started as a class project for CST2301 (Multimedia and Mobile Device Programming), New York City College Of Technology.But then got transformed into a personal goal of bringing all CST courses for the entire program into one single App. 
This is of course just the beginning, and "a journey of a thousand miles begins with a single step" as Lao Tzu would say. This, ladies and gents, is my first step.
 I would still need help from you. Any feedback, suggestion, or feature that you would like to see in the App would be taken very seriously and, if I have the means and the time, I would make it possible.
 I would like, as well, to give some special thanks; first to Prof. Ari Vega whose devotion for his class has pushed us to go a step beyond what was expected from us.
 I would like to thank 
iconarchive.com, 
cooltext.com,
snible.org,
twistedwave.com,
apps.pixlr.com/editor/ 
for their free content and helpful resources that, when limited by time and means, would turn out to be extremely helpful.
 Now concerning updates for the App. I am willing to include more content as soon as possible. With some feedback from you guys this could become an extremely useful tool for students. I am willing to work on the design as well, so any suggestion on that side is something that I will also consider.

 One last thing. This App is, and will remain totally free.
